column4: does anyone have any expireance in getting hardware accelleration to work in virtualbox (windows)?
hardware acc as in vt or 3d?
excuse me? Im trying to enable directX by using Wine's OpenGL wrapper or something like that... So i can use Aero and other fancy stuff
well i did install that stuff, but havent tried it out yet
how did you install it? I cant get admin privileges any way
drop to safe mode and install
i have, but i still have 'access denied' !
what do you mean? I run virtualbox and start windows in safe mode. yes
do you get access denied inside the windows host
im not sure what you mean, but i think yes, access denied if from within the windows os.
dunno then, you should have the proper rights in safe mode
what OS do you run in vbox, windows 7?
not yet :(, just windows XP atm
that may be the reason why...
